original_text:
“In that day I will respond,”
    declares the Lord—
“I will respond to the skies,
    and they will respond to the earth;
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 그 날에 내가 응답하리라 나는 하늘에 응답하고 하늘은 땅에 응답하고

sentences.original_text: In that day I will respond,
I will respond to the skies,
and they will respond to the earth;
